title: Sunday Morning
description: He had no business loving me. I had no idea what I was getting into by loving him. Kirk Johansson rode with the motorcycle club controlling the hellhole I called home. He was dangerous, and I wasn’t looking to become prey. Logic demanded I kept my distance, and I tried to play things safe. Until one Sunday morning… Sunday Morning is a novella containing sexual content, harsh language, and adult situations.Miranda Koryluk - Illustrator
author: Bijou Hunter
